message: Let's start fair. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.  We have plenty of time to work out a better deal if you don't like it.
I think a 55/45 split is a more fair starting point. Let's see if we can find a mutually beneficial solution.
Let's be reasonable. I think a 50/50 split is the fairest way to divide the money.  We've both had our turns making proposals, and this feels like a good compromise.
